website_summaries.verdict: Birkenstocks that are suitable for men who want versatile, stylish looks, a secure fit, and structured comfort once broken in.
pros: Suitable for those who like sandals that stay put, thanks to the additional back strap
We love the rich color and oiled leather
Gets high marks for its soft footbed, which provides superior shock absorption
Style looks good enough to wear with semi-dressy summer outfits
One of the top picks in the family of fine sandals
cons: The leather straps are a bit stiff at first, requiring a break-in period
Sizes vary wildly, as some consumers say they run too narrow while others find the fit on the large side

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right, but genuine
customer_reviews.text: As a lifelong Birkenstock wearer, I have to say that something about this pair is a bit "Off." Another reviewer said that they seemed counterfeit. I hesitate to go that far, but there are a few things that make me think these might be, let's just say "Wrong." Keeping them because I wore them in the mud (don't ask) but they feel weird. Edit: After having spoken with the seller, I believe these to be genuine Birkenstocks. Take my above comments as proof that even the best manufacturers will eventually produce a product that is so inferior to its earlier iterations that it seems fake. Dang...
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, just BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Birkenstocks for over 30 years, so I know how they fit and feel. I couldn’t get my foot into this sandal, though it’s my normal size. The straps didn’t even meet, much less buckle! I tried to get some sort of refund through the Birkenstock company and they refused to replace or refund. They were rude. So I’ve been stuck with these never worn sandals.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: ... Burks without the back strap several years ago and loved them. I picked up these recently because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair or Burks without the back strap several years ago and loved them. I picked up these recently because I was looking for a pair that allowed me to hike easier without worrying about losing a sandal on the rocks or uneven terrain - these are perfect. Fit great and are breaking in much easier than my last pair - I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! Purchased this item a few months back, in February, the quality of the sandals was despicable, my husband's feet clearly did not fit, the sandals were suppose to fit wide feet, not a chance!!! This is not our first purchase of this brand. Returned it the same day, still waiting for my refund. My Amazon credit card account never got the refund back, however, Amazon site posted as it's been settled. Now I am back and forth between the credit card people and Amazon site, frustrated, obviously someone is trying to scam us of money and there is not much help. I expected more from Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elena I Titianu

customer_reviews.title: always very pleased. These fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are the first sandals of this type I have ever owned. I have worn different Birkenstock shoes over the years, always very pleased. These fit perfectly. The leather straps are as advertised to be supple. Yes, the sandals will need some breaking in time, but I wore them out of the box for about 3 hours with no blisters or scrapes or discomfort. Everything is as advertised, and even better. Several months later in time----these sandals are very much first rate. I just ordered the same sandal in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Box & Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I find it odd to have a sandal like this "Unisex". This sandals are Huge, I'm a petite woman with a size 5 - 5 1/2 foot, for which 36 is supposed to fit, these are very wide in the upper foot at ball and toes, the top buckle hits across mid toes with a lot of extra room before my toes hit the edge of the sandal. Also, the box was very badly damaged in transit, came apart entirely once I removed from the flimsy envelope it was sent in. I'm all for minimal and environmentally friendly packaging, but it should also be sturdy and smartly done.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple pair of Birkenstocks Shoes and Sandals and these are true to all the others. I like that they conform to the contours of My feet the more they are worn the more comfortable they become, super cushy on asphalt, concrete, tile and wood surfaces and the last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: DrewT4R

customer_reviews.title: Weird differences in strap length
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same size we ordered before, and the foot bed is the same. BUT, the straps are not the same from one shoe to the other. On one side the straps are so short my husband can barely make it into the loosest hole. The other foot the straps are considerably longer. And, no, his feet are not very different from each other. Are they still making these in Germany, or are they farming them out to China?
customer_reviews.author: MDyak

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the item I was sent was not the size I ordered, and since it was a warehouse purchase I did not have the option to get the correct size. The product was beautiful - soft leather, footbed was dreamy, very rugged construction. Had it been the right size it would have been great. Deducting one star because the back strap is cut so that there is a slight gap or bend which looks a bit odd. Otherwise a very lovely sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and should last for years.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Not something I'd expect for such thick leather and robust sole. I wore it for 2 weeks straight in the summer right out of the box, no socks. And no hot spots, blisters etc. Just the perfect sandal. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: New leather is inflexible.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a complaint, although it causes problems with putting them on. The straps are new, thicker, and stronger leather than similar brands. In a few month they will loosen up a little, but in the meantime the back strap folds under my heel and is hard to straighten out and pull up around my heel. For those not familiar with BIRKENSTOCK, make sure your size consideration is correct. They loosen up a little, but the quality prevents them from getting sloppy and loose over time. I do like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ken Rich

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made knockoffs.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Birkenstocks for 40 years, and always got them from either a Birkenstock Store or from Birkenstock.com. I tried Amazon one time for ease and speed, and these are not real Birkenstocks but rather just cheap knockoffs, and fall apart after only 2-3 months worth of wearing. The leather has a patina covering that cracks apart and peals away, and the soles break apart much too quickly. Buy your Birkenstocks from either a Birkenstock Store or from Birkenstock.com. They're a little slower in arriving, but you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It provides good arch support with its cork sole
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is a pair of Birkenstock and it works as a pair of Birkenstock should. It provides good arch support with its cork sole. The leather is thick, soft, wraps about my feet nicely. I know my size for Birkenstock but if you are new, be sure to check local stores first. Fitness is very important for fitting into a pair of Birks as the sole is molded with grooves.
customer_reviews.author: JF Yang

customer_reviews.title: Back to the good times!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a pair of Birkenstocks in a LONG time. So happy to find these to wear as I recover from a broken toe. Much better than the flip flops I tried. Previously I wore the Arizonas but I really like having the back strap on these. I am sure I will wear these into fall with socks.
customer_reviews.author: SJME

customer_reviews.title: I have flat feet so the arch support is good. I missed having 'Birks' in my life so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet so the arch support is good. I missed having 'Birks' in my life so I picked these up. I had to get additional notches on the straps closest to my ankles from a shoe repairman who specializes in Birkenstocks, but overall the fit was not bad and has gotten better with time. Thanks to him, I was able to know how they were supposed to fit. So, if you are not clear on the fit, find someone in your area who can help you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: A nice sandal after you find the proper fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this style Birkenstock for several years and find them quite satisfactory for both comfort and durability. New users will likely need a couple of tries to get the proper fit. The sandal can be re-soled, but even if the cork bed is restored when it breaks down, the support angle is often not the same. They are relatively expensive, but I recommend replacing the whole shoe when the soles are worn down. If you can find a shoe store where you can try them on and make your first purchase, I recommend you do so. Later, Amazon offers convent ordering and no tax, but the price is the same as retail, or nearly so.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Box

customer_reviews.title: middle strap too short
customer_reviews.text: I have worn back-strap Birkenstocks for years. and was very disappointed with this product. The leather is extremely hard and stiff, but the main problem is that the main strap across the middle of the foot is very short; even with two new holes punched in it i can barely get it buckled. Maybe it is loosen up with wear and time, but at this point it is such a hassle to get them on that I am looking elsewhere for sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Bob. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off for first time in 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Got correct sizing for shoe size and have worn the same model in the past about ever 1-2 yrs since 1997. This year even at the furthest hole in the straps, the size is too small. I'll need to take these to a shoe store or Birkenstock store and have it stretched a bit until I can wear them comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals,design changes were a mistake however.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Birkenstocks for years,can't beat them. Only problem with this pair is they have the new soft footbed which I did not want.This fact was not explained well enough in the description,in my opinion.Set up return to Amazon,but returns are an aggravation to me so I kept them.They are still excellent shoes,but I personally believe the soft footbed is silly.When you get a product right,leave it alone.Also The older model of these sandals had a snap on the back strap which was much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quality Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first pair lasted three years and still qualifies for resoling. It takes a bit to break in these sandals, but do not give up on them. Once broken in they fit and feel like no other sandal on the planet. Very happy and will certainly buy again. I hope they keep making the same model without trying to improve on them!
customer_reviews.author: tonybazz

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock Men's Milano SFB Slingback
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are well made, and supportive. They were too large for my feet. I did follow the chart for sizing. The leather is thick, somewhat stiff. Returned due to size. I did believe all Birkenstocks were Unisex. I had owned a pair prior to these which were purchased at a small shop in Greencastle, PA. in 2001-2002, sold to me as Birkenstocks. I still have them and wear them, all seasons, with socks in the cooler weather. I was trying to find the exact shoe for purchase. The new ones were not even close. But, the new ones are very well constructed, well crafted, and will probably last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstocks are the best shoe you will ever put on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Birkenstock. They are super when you have problem feet. they will make all of your feet pain disappear. However I ordered the wrong size for myself and unfortunately had to send it back. But I will be ordering a new pair in my size today
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ryon

customer_reviews.title: It had been almost 50 years since my last pair and they're better than ever
customer_reviews.text: I last wore Birkenstocks while in college in the 70's and when I was needing good walking sandals for an upcoming trip I remembered how wonderful these shoes were so I bought my first pair in almost 50 years. They are as wonderful as ever. I wear a women's 7 M in most shoes and this size 37 M fit perfectly. The soft sole is an added touch and are worth the extra money. I'm very happy and feel like I'm back in Berkeley!
customer_reviews.author: Ebalaz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.  Gotta love Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Birkenstocks lasted 25 years and I suspect this pair will perform as well. Very pleased. Yes - they are expensive but in this instance you get a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MA burbster

customer_reviews.title: Good Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is not an original Birkenstock. It's a very good fake though, if you don't mind this, go for it. I'm returning mine and going through Zappos. These came in a plastic bag, with no box. The brown is more of a black than it looks from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Birkenstock’s. However this is my first pair of the cork sole. I have to say these sandals are well built. The leather straps are thick and the cork sole is well crafted. The sandals are very comfortable right out of the box. I can’t imagine how much better they will feel after they break in. Get these sandals. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Torres

customer_reviews.title: We love Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: My husband exclusively wears Birkenstock shoes. He loves the brand for their comfort, arch support and quality. Investing in a good shoe matters, especially if you’re on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ema Ruzic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Hard to beat Birkenstocks for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Hard to beat Birkenstocks for comfort; once broken in, they conform to your foot. My old Born sandals blew out on and I wanted something without a leather footbed. I don't have them completely broken in yet, as the weather has started to get gold, but I look forward to many years of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals I’ve ever owned. Not my first pair and won’t be my last. I tried finding other sandals as comfortable as these and probably spent a couple hundred dollars on other sandals over the years but never successful. Birkenstock’s are not cheap but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Thor Odinsson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Milanos!
customer_reviews.text: Never tried Birkenstocks before, but I just had surgery and my surgeon and physical therapist recommended them. They are outstanding and I will love them long past healing. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Great for suffers of Planter Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: Suffering from Planter Fasciitis this was recommended. These help A LOT. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Real birks. Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package it was destroyed. I blame this on fed-ex. Fed-exers pieced it back together in a poly bag, and the shoes themselves were okay. 2 stars for effort on the part of fed ex. 5 for the quality of Birks. These shoes are foot heaven after working all day or when wearing any other time.
customer_reviews.author: Chester A.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks so nice, the quality is good. But it is not comfortable, and it is tight from the sides
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Love My Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few weeks for sole to match feet bottoms, but worth the wait. Great support for my flat arches.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo John

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Has Gone Down
customer_reviews.text: These had a couple of the rivets which hold the buckle part not crimped down fully. In fact, one was completely straight and stuck into my foot when I put it on. Very disappointing. I heard their quality had declined over the years, but this is something really bad. Also, lots of sloppy glue and just not worth the money at all. I've bought better sandals for $50. Think I am done with Birkenstock.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstocks Rock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to replace really old ones he had. He will finish the review. They look good, they fit well, they’re comfortable. And their price is reasonable. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: The arch is painful for my husband who is midly flat footed
customer_reviews.text: The arch is painful for my husband who is midly flat footed. No adjustments have helped the sandal to fit confortably. Very sidappointing. Can't return it because we made new holes in the lower straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Leather Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Nice classy leather sandals. The true soft leather, brand, and the back strap design differentiate it from other sandals in the market. Instead of the US size, I used the EU sizing indicated on my running shoes to get the correct fit. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard SV Merks

customer_reviews.title: good job Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We bought this same pair of sandals from a local store, & had to return them because they were ridiculously narrow. When we went back to the store the clerk said that Birkenstock made no larger sizes. Point of the story...good job Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: NNT

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Brutal break-in period but pretty comfortable after. They run small so get a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Sam J. Licitra

customer_reviews.title: Beat Birkenstock sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: I have bad feet from years of working on my feet & playing sports. Birkenstock's are by far the best shoes for bad feet. This is my 2nd pair of Milano Soft foot bed sandals & I must say they are still the most comfortable sandals I have ever bought in a Birkenstock. the soft foot bed is so comfy & eliminates the usual break in period for Birkensticj foot beds, but they have the same great natural support...
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Double Check your Shoe Size
customer_reviews.text: I m glad I got the shoe with a heel belt to help keep the shoe in place
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: That they are really Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: Great leather a great product and just the name Birkenstock says it all and there really Birkenstock fit great
customer_reviews.author: tulio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and for perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wear Birkenstock’s all year round. This order just like others fit perfectly. Awesome Sandle.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Mills

customer_reviews.title: I wear them during the workday.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Birks; it’s like vacation for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wenz

customer_reviews.title: Defective sandal - felt like it was fake.
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. Had 2 cm thick glue on the strap. Product didnt come in original box and packaging. It looked fake.
customer_reviews.author: Piya

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best in the world but useless and painful if you have a wide foot as I do. They do not make this product in a wide and you can not comfortably adjust the straps to accommodate. They hurt on the sides where the seam cuts into your foot. Wasted my money. A lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: SamTakeo

customer_reviews.title: Five stars, minus the defect.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great, the comfort is priceless. I am returning the sandals though due to a defect. On the left sandal the footboard and sole are not sealed completely.. Because of the length off time an on wearing them, this slight defecate be a major downfall. I only want to exchange them for a perfect pair of sandals. During this layover time, I will surely recognize their absence.o
customer_reviews.author: OdAQwq

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good style, supportive, stay in place when walking a fair amount and no clapping like “flip-flops”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Refunded money relatively promptly... Make sizing in US sizes a little more clear no idea what my Birkenstock size is no direction.
customer_reviews.author: breena coffey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are nice Birkenstock's but had to return them, to seller! thank you anyway
customer_reviews.author: Don R.

customer_reviews.title: Save gas, use the Birks !!
customer_reviews.text: Would sleep with these on, if it didn't sound so weird typing that statement. Right out of the box, walked 6 miles with no issues. These are by far my favorite "Birks"..... LPC's will save the planet!! (Leather Personnel Carriers)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The genuine article. Great quality. Great fit. Wonderful shoe. Delivered on time by the seller. A pleasure to slip on after a hard day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected everything to be with Birkenstock quality. On this particular model, the brown leather is a little shiny and the leather somewhat stiff. Both things will take care of themselves with my regular wearing. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Peace love birks
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my daughters birthday and she loves them✌️
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish fits great and the footbed is so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: shop2udropgirl2010

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock Milano sandal is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my 18 year old grandson for Christmas and he loved them. They are good-looking, fit well, and very comfortable. Because they have a backstop, they are good if you are going to do much walking.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Cox

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like back strap
customer_reviews.text: These were nice but the back buckle was more than I wanted to deal with when putting on.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking Birks
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a size 12 for Father's day. My dad wasn't sure if he needed a size up so we also ordered the 13. He kept the 12 & we will ship the 13 back.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birkenstock’s , same quality that I have been purchasing fo 25 years
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these, I usually order these same ones for him every few years b/c he wears them out!!
customer_reviews.author: Heide Pedrioli

customer_reviews.title: Great birks
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birkenstock Milano. Fits as expected and feels really comfortable. The cork was sealed, but I put an extra coat on with the cork sealant I ordered. Personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stiff leather, so am hoping that as the leather ages and softens it will stop pinching the foot.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Classic throw back coming back into style. "I used to be a hippie" is a hot look. ; )
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: but the feel like this pair is made of harder leather and not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have own 20 pairs of Birkenstocks, but the feel like this pair is made of harder leather and not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shayv8

customer_reviews.title: He is very picky about tight shoes and liked that he could adjust the size
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad for his birthday. He is very picky about tight shoes and liked that he could adjust the size. He says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Leana

customer_reviews.title: ... wore them with high hopes that they would be comfortable. Instead they rubbed sores on the ropes of ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received these shoes I wore them with high hopes that they would be comfortable. Instead they rubbed sores on the tops of my feet and painfully hurt the outside bottom of my right foot. I cannot wear these at all. Went right into the garbage bin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Purple

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I wanted but I would caution ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted but I would caution you if you buy this shoe style go up one size from what you normally wear in Birkenstock's. Because the back strap takes away some of the foot bed room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for people with arch problems
customer_reviews.text: I Had heard that Birkenstock's were great for people with arch problems. My sister raved about her so I bought a pair and I'm so glad I did. They are so comfortable, I can barely believe it. It's a shame I waited till fall to get them. I should have gotten them sooner so I could wear them all summer. Well I guess I'm ready for next year now!
customer_reviews.author: NOR

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and provide great support for my son's flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Maryum K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time with the soft foot bed - I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Taylor

customer_reviews.title: "Nothing is like it used to be"
customer_reviews.text: The sole has already worn down. with very little use, and I was shocked as I have being wearing BIRKENSTOCKS for my whole life and they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K P

customer_reviews.title: They ARE all that!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on wife’s high recommendation. NOT let down. These are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: McJim

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Problem with my feet -- difficult to fit comfortably. Unfortunately, must return.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is more comfortable than Birkenstocks, the only sandal I can wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Kersting

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great! Maybe my feet is a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Birk's
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my son. He loves them. Fast shipping. Great transaction. Arrived in time and correct size and color
customer_reviews.author: Gary Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Leather too stiff
customer_reviews.text: The leather was very stiff. You will need a leathernsoftening material/soap to work it in a few times just to make it even wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric's Profile

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes he has ever had
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes he has ever had. I bought them because his feet are always hurting and his podiatrist recommended them. We are now shopping for a work boot.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J.

customer_reviews.title: the feet "really" like the soft foot bed and stiff soul
customer_reviews.text: My first Birkenstocks, the feet "really" like the soft foot bed and stiff soul. Major happy with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Locoweed

customer_reviews.title: They are VERY stiff and require months is wearing before they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They replace an identical pair that are falling apart after 20 years of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: RJMR

customer_reviews.title: Anklestrap too loose
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Birkenstocks for several years because of foot problems. I thought I'd try a pair with a strap, but could not tighten it enough to keep the strap from sliding up and down on my heel. Thanks, Amazon, for easy returns!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Runs large. I would order one size smaller. The color is great and they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jshimwhitAZ

customer_reviews.title: A happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The arch support was better than I expected. I use support shoe forms and the support provided by this pair of sandals was exceptional. Leather was soft and the entire product was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A.PequenoRossie

customer_reviews.title: Buckles have a "scratched" look
customer_reviews.text: Note that the buckles have a "scratched" look which makes them look old and worn out even when new. You can kind of see it in the images if you zoom in but it's even more so. Just FYI!
customer_reviews.author: G S

customer_reviews.title: My review ( below ) about metal protruding thru leather
customer_reviews.text: Both L & R sandals had a sharp protruding piece of metal that I had to file down and take a chance that it would work ( rather than send them back for an exchange)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carlin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: They are Birkenstocks, what else do I need to say?
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Arellano

customer_reviews.title: SOFT FOOTBED SANDAL, NOT THE STANDARD BIRKENSTOCK FOOTBED.
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE STANDARD BIRKINSTOCK FOOTBED. I ordered this sandal only to find when it arrived that this is the so-called SOFT FOOTBED model. I am going to keep the sandal and see how I like it in the long run, since standard footbed black Milano sandals have been out of stock all summer. However, I have turned down soft footbed models in stores in favor of the standard footbed. The text for this item should clearly state that this is a soft footbed version of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: vcmjr

customer_reviews.title: These really bring me back - even more comfortable now. I imagine these will last about 20+ ...
customer_reviews.text: These really bring me back - even more comfortable now. I imagine these will last about 20+ years. Comfortable and durable. In Seattle we wear them with wool hiking socks in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mariodonna

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a foot problem
customer_reviews.text: I had an odd issue with foot pain and found out your foot has a metatarsal arch just under the base of your toes. The foot pain is gone after wearing my birks.
customer_reviews.author: Intergraph

customer_reviews.title: Stiff leather upper.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is stiff as a board! Hopefully I will be able to break them in(soften them up) before they give me too many blisters.
customer_reviews.author: robert  balzer

customer_reviews.title: but these are the best pair of sandals i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Needs a modest break-in period, but these are the best pair of sandals i have ever owned. Fits exactly to my feet (8M).
customer_reviews.author: C0SM0

customer_reviews.title: hooray for Birkenstock !
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Birkenstocks for many years and love'em. These are so comfortable and required no break in time.
customer_reviews.author: homegrown

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet again.
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of these for decades, they've gotten pricey but nothing else compares for me.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Conard

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for years. They're the best for my feet. Obviously these do not provide ankle support but arch support is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Harry the Traveler

customer_reviews.title: the leather
customer_reviews.text: The leather is a little stiff on the toes. I imagine with time the leather will get a little softer.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Payne Sr

customer_reviews.title: Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Feel comfortable, let you know after they get broke in
customer_reviews.author: David A. Cwik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I had to repair the soles, but this are great super comfy sandals. Will buy more of the Birkenstock styles!!! I already have 2 of them...zero complaints. Perfect fit, I can wear them everywhere, I don't care!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann R.

customer_reviews.title: my feet always feel so good while wearing them
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a pair of these since high school, my feet always feel so good while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Clem

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with these as I knew I would be
customer_reviews.text: I buy new Birkenstock sandals, same ones, yearly. I'm happy with these as I knew I would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: BIRKENSTOCK Milano Unisex Soft Footbed Leather Sandal
product_meta.description: This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: Classic Birkenstock sandal featuring original dual-strap vamp and adjustable ankle strap with antiqued logo buckles
